title: Do you guys experience this often?
body:
"WHY AREN'T YOU GUYS DIVING."

"WHY AREN'T YOU GUYS BURSTING."

"WHY AREN'T YOU GUYS-"

So then you tell them you don't have that kind of team comp.

And this is all they can say.

"THEN WHY DID YOU PICK X?"

I mean, do you guys experience this often?

It irritates the fuck out of me because a person is complaining about our team comp not being able to do something and then decides to blame you for not making a better pick, even though one pick isn't going to suddenly turn a team comp from one thing into another without good teamwork beforehand.

My biggest issue is I can turn back the question on them, and all they do is bitch and complain about irrelevant things, simply because they know that they could have made a better pick as just could I, except the difference is, I wasn't blaming anyone for their pick, nor was I bitching about irrelevant things and how our team comp is simply because when I see a bad team comp or type of team comp, I already know what to expect.
